explanation: [0-0] A man in a white shirt is squatting in front of a TV in the living room. On the TV screen, Putin, wearing a blue suit, is looking forward with two black microphones in front of him. The man in the white shirt holds a wine bottle in his left hand, the mouth of the bottle to his mouth, and a glass in his right hand. On the wall behind him is beige printed wallpaper, and to his left is a wooden cabinet with some items on it.

[0-8] Then, the man in the white shirt pulls out the cork of the bottle with his teeth, then looks up and spits out the cork. He then raises his right hand holding the glass and pours the wine into it. Afterward, the man stops pouring, raises his glass to Putin on the TV. At the same time, Putin on the TV screen raises his left hand and looks forward. Then he extends his index finger to his mouth. The man leans closer to the TV and looks at it, then turns his head to the left, looking forward.
